description: ProtectedApplicationGroup is the Schema for the protectedapplicationgroups API.

apiVersion.description: APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object. Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and may reject unrecognized values. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description: Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents. Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to. Cannot be updated. In CamelCase. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

spec.description: ProtectedApplicationGroupSpec defines the desired state of ProtectedApplicationGroup.

applications.description:
Applications is an ordered list of ProtectedApplications that required backup consistency between each other. The ordering of these applications determines the quiesce/unquiesce orders: The first app will quiesce first and un-quiesce last. 
 For example: the order of execution 1)     quiesce app_1 2)     quiesce app_2 ....... N)     quiesce app_N 
 [Volume Backup/Snapshot for all app_1..app_N] 
 N+1)   un-quiesce app_N N+2)   un-quiesce app_N-1 ....... 2N-1)  un-quiesce app_2 2N)    un-quiesce app_1 
 All ProtectedApplication referred here must be in the same namespace as this group.
